de.htw.hundertwasser.backend

Class FolderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.hundertwasser.backend.FolderManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FolderManagerObservable, ProgressStatusEventListener

    public class FolderManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressStatusEventListener, FolderManagerObservable
    This class will manage the Folders of the current Project
    Author:
    daniel rhein

      • isFolderExists

        private boolean isFolderExists(java.lang.String path)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method allows to determine if a Folder exists or not.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        true if the given path is a existing folder, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is emtpy or null

      • getWorkingDirectory

        public java.lang.String getWorkingDirectory()
                                     throws CantCreateDirectoryException
        This method returns the working directory.
        This is the ApplicationPath concatenated with the name of our Programm.
        Attention:
        If the working directory won't exist this Method tries to create a Directory.
        If the creation of the working directory fails, you'll receive an CantCreateDirectoryExceptoin

        Returns:
        String with the current working directory.
        Throws:
        CantCreateDirectoryException - it will be thrown if it's not able to create the directory.

      • importPhotoBox

        public PhotoBox importPhotoBox(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String pathtoFile)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                               ChoosenFileNotAFolderException,
                               CantCreateDirectoryException
        ImportPhotobox and it's content to the current working directory.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Photobox
        pathtoFile - this is a ImageFile or a Directory
        Returns:
        The created Photobox
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Occurs if the pathToFile doesn't exists
        ChoosenFileNotAFolderException - Occurs if the Path to File is not a folder
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if one of the parameter is emtpy or null.
        CantCreateDirectoryException
